title: Drawing, "Mask Pattern, Textile Design", 1950–70
medium: Brush and gouache, graphite on paper, lined.
description: Stylized mask pattern consisting of eighteen white masks with blue foreheads and noses, black eyes and large red lips.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Mask Pattern, Textile Design", 1950–70.
1950–70. Brush and gouache, graphite on paper, lined.. Gift of Mr. Donald Cameron. 1992-51-14.
